text: Shadow of Destiny also known in Japan and Europe as is an Mystery adventure game developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Tokyo and published by Konami. Originally released on PlayStation 2 console, then later in 2002 port for Xbox (it has been release only in Europe), Microsoft Windows, and finally also available for PlayStation Portable in Japan (2009) and North America (2010). == Other websites == * Ofiicial website * Official website * Category:2001 video games Category:Konami games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Video games about genies Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
title: Shadow of Destiny
